Disney+ and Marvel Studios invite you on an unexpected holiday getaway, unwrapping a brand-new teaser trailer and poster today for â€œHawkeye,â€ a new series set in post-blip New York City. Former Avenger Clint Barton has a seemingly simple mission: get back to his family for Christmas. Possible? Maybe with the help of Kate Bishop, a 22-year-old archer with dreams of becoming a Super Hero. The two are forced to work together when a presence from Bartonâ€™s past threatens to derail far more than the festive spirit. 

Starring Jeremy Renner as Clint Barton/Hawkeye and Hailee Steinfeld as Kate Bishop, â€œHawkeyeâ€ also features Vera Farmiga, Fra Fee, Tony Dalton, Zahn McClarnon, Brian dâ€™Arcy James and newcomer Alaqua Cox as Maya Lopez. Helmed by Rhys Thomas and directing duo Bert and Bertie, â€œHawkeyeâ€ debuts exclusively on Disney+ on November 24, 2021.
